name: ImprovSuggestions
0:
”Alexa, ask improv suggestion for an occupation”
”Alexa, ask improv suggestion can I get a relationship”
”Alexa, ask improv suggestion to give me a location”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: improv suggestion
des: Ask Alexa for a suggestion for your improvised scenes or games! Great for rehearsals, workshops, or brainstorming. Currently, you can ask suggestions for an occupation, a location, or a relationship.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
